original_text: Who is blind? Nobody is as blind as my servant. 42: Here, God's servant is the Israelite nation. See Isaiah 41:8. Who is deaf? Nobody is as deaf as the one who takes my message. The people that I agreed a covenant with are blind! Yes, the servant of the Lord is truly blind! Who is blind? Nobody is as blind as my servant. 42: Here, God's servant is the Israelite nation. See Isaiah 41:8. Who is deaf? Nobody is as deaf as the one who takes my message. The people that I agreed a covenant with are blind! Yes, the servant of the Lord is truly blind! Who is blind? Nobody is as blind as my servant. 42: Here, God's servant is the Israelite nation. See Isaiah 41:8. Who is deaf? Nobody is as deaf as the one who takes my message. The people that I agreed a covenant with are blind! Yes, the servant of the Lord is truly blind! Who is blind?
korean_text: 맹인이 누구냐 내 종이 아니냐 누가 내가 보내는 내 사자 같이 못 듣는 자겠느냐 누가 내게 충성된 자 같이 맹인이겠느냐 누가 여호와의 종 같이 맹인이겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Who is blind?
Nobody is as blind as my servant.
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 종보다 더 장님인 자는 없다.

sentences.original_text: Here, God's servant is the Israelite nation.
See Isaiah 41:8.
Who is deaf?
Nobody is as deaf as the one who takes my message.
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 메시지를 받는 자보다 더 귀머거리인 자는 없다.

sentences.original_text: The people that I agreed a covenant with are blind!
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 언약을 맺은 백성이 장님 되었도다!

sentences.original_text: Yes, the servant of the Lord is truly blind!
sentences.korean_translation: 그래, 주의 종은 정말 장님 되었도다!
